name: Devcamp
body:
ï»¿Suggested agenda for a one day Azure Camp:
Session Time (min) Activity
Intro to Azure 30 Presentation
Cloud Solutions (PaaS) 15 HOL - Signup
15 HOL - Azure Portal
(optional) HOL - Preview Portal
Websites 45 Presentation
30 HOL - Deploy a website to Azure
Identity and Access (AD) 45 Presentation
60 HOL - Deploy a SPA with AD to Azure
IaaS 45 IaaS
45 HOL - IaaS
Data overview 45 Presentation
45 HOL - DocumentDB or
HOL - Elastic Scale
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
